solution_line_template: It takes {rob_time} hour * {mark_multiplier} = <<{rob_time}*{mark_multiplier}={mark_time}>>{mark_time} hours for Mark to get to the national park.
The extra time it takes Mark to get to the national park is {mark_time} hours - {rob_time} hour = <<{mark_time}-{rob_time}={extra_time}>>{extra_time} hours
Mark should leave his home at {rob_departure_time} a.m. - {extra_time} hours = <<{rob_departure_time}-{extra_time}={mark_departure_time}>>{mark_departure_time} a.m.
